title: Steam Summer Sale Thread

replies.body: I want Papers, Please to come down cheaper :D

replies.body: I bought CS:GO for 5 bucks :P, this sale is awesome.
replies.body_tagged: I bought CS:GO for 5 bucks :P, this sale is awesome.

replies.body: I bought all my games in winter sale <3 DayZ for life until I play with lokiandfrey and then Ducksfanwaterloo comes to his house, handcuffs me, puts a bag over me, I fall to the ground and then they try breaking my legs, they break theirs and die, 20 min later they come back, lokiandfrey leaves for a second and then ducksfanwaterloo shoots me in the chest 3 times... ahhh good times...
